SC 13G/A 1 d465280dsc13ga.htm SC 13G/A SC 13G/A &nbsp; &nbsp; SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION Washington, D.C. 20549 &nbsp; &nbsp; SCHEDULE 13G (Rule 13d-102) Information to be Included in Statements Filed Pursuant to &#167; 240.13d-1(b), (c) and (d)&nbsp;and Amendments Thereto Filed Pursuant to &#167; 240.13d-2 Under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (Amendment No.&nbsp;1)* &nbsp; &nbsp; Nu Holdings Ltd. (Name of Issuer) Class&nbsp;A ordinary shares, par value $ 0.000006666666667 per share (Title of Class&nbsp;of Securities) G6683N 103** (CUSIP Number) December&nbsp;31, 2022 (Date of Event Which Requires Filing of this Statement) &nbsp; &nbsp; Check the appropriate box to designate the rule pursuant to which this schedule is filed: &#9744; Rule 13d-1(b) &#9744; Rule 13d-1(c) &#9746; Rule 13d-1(d) &nbsp; * The remainder of this cover page shall be filled out for a reporting person&#146;s initial filing on this form with respect to the subject class of securities, and for any subsequent amendment containing information which would alter the disclosures provided in a prior cover page. ** This CUSIP number applies to the Issuer&#146;s Class&nbsp;A Ordinary Stock. The information required in the remainder of this cover page shall not be deemed to be &#147;filed&#148; for the purpose of Section&nbsp;18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#147;Act&#148;) or otherwise subject to the liabilities of that section of the Act but shall be subject to all other provisions of the Act (however, see the Notes). &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;1&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;NAME OF REPORTING PERSON &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH FUND VI, L.P. SEQUOIA CAPITAL FUND MANAGEMENT is the general partner of SCF and the manager of SCFP. &nbsp;&nbsp; 7 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;SOLE DISPOSITIVE POWER &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;0 &nbsp;&nbsp; 8 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;SHARED DISPOSITIVE POWER &nbsp; 32,474,809 shares, of which 5,276,693 shares are directly owned by SCFP and 27,198,116 shares are directly owned by SCF. SEQUOIA CAPITAL FUND MANAGEMENT is the general partner of SCF and the manager of SCFP. &nbsp;&nbsp;9&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AGGREGATE AMOUNT BENEFICIALLY OWNED BY EACH REPORTING PERSON &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;32,474,809 10 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;CHECK BOX IF THE AGGREGATE AMOUNT IN ROW (9)&nbsp;EXCLUDES CERTAIN SHARES &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; 11 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;PERCENT OF CLASS REPRESENTED BY AMOUNT IN ROW 9 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;0.9%1 12 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;TYPE OF REPORTING PERSON &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;PN &nbsp; 1 Based on a total of 360,077,866 shares of Class&nbsp;A common stock as of October&nbsp;31, 2022, as reported in the Issuer&#146;s Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on November&nbsp;4, 2022. &nbsp;&nbsp;1&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;NAME OF REPORTING PERSON &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;SC US (TTGP), LTD. (&#147;SC US (TTGP)&#148;) &nbsp;&nbsp;2 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;CHECK THE APPROPRIATE BOX IF A MEMBER OF A GROUP &nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;3 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;SEC USE ONLY &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;4 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;CITIZENSHIP OR PLACE OF ORGANIZATION &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;CAYMAN ISLANDS NUMBER&nbsp;OF SHARES &nbsp;BENEFICIALLY&nbsp; OWNED&nbsp;BY EACH REPORTING PERSON WITH &nbsp;&nbsp; 5&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;SOLE VOTING POWER &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;0 &nbsp;&nbsp; 6 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;SHARED VOTING POWER &nbsp; 435,293,189 shares, of which 105,671,554 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH FUND VI, 6,377,400 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH PRINCIPALS VI FUND, 223,296,216 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE FUND XIV, 11,157,930 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. PARTNERS FUND XIV, 56,315,280 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE PARTNERS FUND XV (Q), 5,276,693 shares are directly owned by SCFP and 27,198,116 shares are directly owned by SCF. The General Partner of each of SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH FUND VI and SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH PRINCIPALS VI FUND is SC U.S. GROWTH VI MANAGEMENT. The General Partner of each of SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE FUND XIV, SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. PARTNERS FUND XIV and SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE PARTNERS FUND XV (Q)&nbsp;is SC U.S. VENTURE XIV MANAGEMENT. SEQUOIA CAPITAL FUND MANAGEMENT is the general partner of SCF and the manager of SCFP. The General Partner of each of SC U.S. GROWTH VI MANAGEMENT, SC U.S. VENTURE XIV MANAGEMENT and SEQUOIA CAPITAL FUND MANAGEMENT is SC US (TTGP). &nbsp;&nbsp; 7 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;SOLE DISPOSITIVE POWER &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;0 &nbsp;&nbsp; 8 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;SHARED DISPOSITIVE POWER &nbsp; 435,293,189 shares, of which 105,671,554 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH FUND VI, 6,377,400 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH PRINCIPALS VI FUND, 223,296,216 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE FUND XIV, 11,157,930 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. PARTNERS FUND XIV, 56,315,280 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE PARTNERS FUND XV (Q), 5,276,693 shares are directly owned by SCFP and 27,198,116 shares are directly owned by SCF. The General Partner of each of SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH FUND VI and SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH PRINCIPALS VI FUND is SC U.S. GROWTH VI MANAGEMENT. The General Partner of each of SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE FUND XIV, SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. PARTNERS FUND XIV and SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE PARTNERS FUND XV (Q)&nbsp;is SC U.S. VENTURE XIV MANAGEMENT. SEQUOIA CAPITAL FUND MANAGEMENT is the general partner of SCF and the manager of SCFP. The General Partner of each of SC U.S. GROWTH VI MANAGEMENT, SC U.S. VENTURE XIV MANAGEMENT and SEQUOIA CAPITAL FUND MANAGEMENT is SC US (TTGP). &nbsp;&nbsp;9&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;AGGREGATE AMOUNT BENEFICIALLY OWNED BY EACH REPORTING PERSON &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;435,293,189 10 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;CHECK BOX IF THE AGGREGATE AMOUNT IN ROW (9)&nbsp;EXCLUDES CERTAIN SHARES &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; 11 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;PERCENT OF CLASS REPRESENTED BY AMOUNT IN ROW 9 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;12.6%1 12 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;TYPE OF REPORTING PERSON &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;OO &nbsp; 1 Based on a total of 3,459,743,432 shares of common stock outstanding as of December&nbsp;31, 2021 as reported in the Issuer&#146;s Annual Report on Form 20-F for the yearly period ended December&nbsp;31, 2021, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on April&nbsp;21, 2022. ITEM 1. &nbsp; (a) Name of Issuer: Nu Holdings, Ltd. &nbsp; (b) Address of Issuer&#146;s Principal Executive Offices: Campbells Corporate Services Limited, Floor 4, Willow House, Cricket Square, KY1-9010 Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands ITEM 2. &nbsp; (a) Name of Persons Filing: Sequoia Capital U.S. Growth Fund VI, L.P. Sequoia Capital U.S. Growth Principals VI Fund, L.P. Sequoia Capital U.S. Venture Fund XIV, L.P. Sequoia Capital U.S. Venture Partners Fund XIV, L.P. Sequoia Capital Fund Management, L.P. SC US (TTGP), Ltd. The General Partner of SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH FUND VI and SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH PRINCIPALS VI FUND is SC U.S. GROWTH VI MANAGEMENT. The General Partner of SC U.S. GROWTH VI MANAGEMENT is SC US (TTGP). The General Partner of SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE FUND XIV, SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. PARTNERS FUND XIV and SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE PARTNERS FUND XIV (Q)&nbsp;is SC U.S. VENTURE XIV MANAGEMENT. The General Partner of SC U.S. VENTURE XIV MANAGEMENT is SC US (TTGP). The General Partner of SCF and the manager of SCFP is SEQUOIA CAPITAL FUND MANAGEMENT. SC US (TTGP) is the general partner of SEQUOIA CAPITAL FUND MANAGEMENT. &nbsp; (b) Address of Principal Business Office or, if none, Residence: 2800 Sand Hill Road, Suite 101 Menlo Park, CA 94025 &nbsp; (c) Citizenship: SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH FUND VI, SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH PRINCIPALS VI FUND, SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE FUND XIV, SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. PARTNERS FUND XIV, SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE PARTNERS FUND XIV (Q), SCF, SC U.S. GROWTH VI MANAGEMENT, SC U.S. VENTURE XV MANAGEMENT, SEQUOIA CAPITAL FUND MANAGEMENT, SC US (TTGP): Cayman Islands SCFP: Delaware &nbsp; (d) CUSIP No.: G6683N 103 ITEM 3.
